subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Running back Ronnie Brown, the Miami Dolphins’ leading rusher, had surgery yesterday to stabilize a broken left hand. Other than saying Brown will be “evaluated on an ongoing basis,” the Dolphins did not reveal a timetable for his return.
snippet: Running back Ronnie Brown, the Miami Dolphins’ leading rusher, had surgery yesterday to stabilize a broken left hand. Other than saying Brown will be “evaluated on an ongoing basis,” the Dolphins did not reveal a timetable for his return.
